title: About SaaS Template
description: A comprehensive, production-ready SaaS application template built with modern technologies to accelerate your development journey

content.heading: About SaaS Template
content.intro1: SaaS Template is a comprehensive, production-ready foundation for building modern Software-as-a-Service applications. Designed by experienced developers, it combines industry best practices with cutting-edge technologies to help you launch your SaaS product faster and more reliably.
content.intro2: Our template eliminates months of initial development work by providing a robust, scalable architecture that handles authentication, user management, billing, internationalization, and more out of the box.

authentication.title: Advanced Authentication
authentication.description: OAuth integration with Google and GitHub, secure session management, and role-based access control

ui.title: Modern UI Components
ui.description: Beautiful, accessible UI built with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components with dark mode support

internationalization.title: Multi-language Support
internationalization.description: Built-in internationalization with English and Chinese support, easily extensible to other languages

dashboard.title: Feature-rich Dashboard
dashboard.description: Complete user dashboard with profile management, settings, usage analytics, and billing integration

responsive.title: Mobile-First Design
responsive.description: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

seo.title: SEO Optimized
seo.description: Built-in SEO optimization with sitemap generation, meta tags, and search engine friendly URLs

timeToMarket.title: Faster Time to Market
timeToMarket.description: Skip months of initial development. Our template provides a solid foundation so you can focus on your unique business logic.

bestPractices.title: Industry Best Practices
bestPractices.description: Built following modern development standards, security guidelines, and performance optimization techniques.

scalable.title: Scalable Architecture
scalable.description: Designed to grow with your business. From startup to enterprise, our architecture scales with your needs.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Open source with active community support. Continuous updates and improvements based on real-world usage.

quality.title: Code Quality
quality.description: We prioritize clean, maintainable code with comprehensive TypeScript support and thorough testing

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Optimized for speed with lazy loading, efficient bundling, and modern performance techniques

security.title: Security by Design
security.description: Built-in security features including CSRF protection, secure headers, and OAuth best practices

developer.title: Developer Experience
developer.description: Excellent DX with hot reload, TypeScript intellisense, and comprehensive documentation

content.getStartedText: Join thousands of developers who have chosen SaaS Template to build their next successful SaaS application. Whether you're a startup founder, freelance developer, or enterprise team, our template provides the foundation you need.
